text.div:
BCI OncotypeDXRiskScoreInterpretationCS CodeSystem

Intepretation of OncotypeDX Recurrence Score

name: BCI OncotypeDXRiskScoreInterpretationCS CodeSystem
title: BCI OncotypeDXRiskScoreInterpretationCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: Recurrence Score lower than 18: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.
concept.definition: Recurrence Score lower than 18: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.

concept.display: Recurrence Score of 18 up to and including 30: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.
concept.definition: Recurrence Score of 18 up to and including 30: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.

concept.display: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 31: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
concept.definition: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 31: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
